quotes: We had a very interesting process in 2008 when we did national priorities, this is like priorities of priorities, where donors are actually putting their money to achieve the same goal as the government.
And that was interesting, because there were lessons learned from that process and in 2009 we are going to do seven working groups.

In 2008, Special Representative of the Secretary-General, Atul Khare, spoke in New York City and emphasized that there is a new role for the UN in Timor, where the country is given a lot more assistance as opposed to being controlled.

organizations.name: World Bank
quotes: We get the World Bank, who is not part of any of this, to do the evaluation.

roles.title: minister
quotes: And each working group is run by a minister and is assisted by a donor who has to help to pull off the results of the working group.
no donor is allowed to come with projects into Timor unless you have agreed to it.
